mapper.update:
UPDATE u_info
name = #{name},
triggers = #{triggers},
type = #{type},
is_start = #{isStart},
system_info = #{systemInfo},
moblie_info = #{moblieInfo},
we_chat_official_info = #{weChatOfficialInfo},
mail_info_title = #{mailInfoTitle},
mail_info = #{mailInfo},
mail_remark = #{mailRemark},
info_template_remark = #{infoTemplateRemark},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
info_inform = #{infoInform},
is_admin = #{isAdmin},
title = #{title},
WHERE id = #{id}
